pullRequest.title: [BULK] - DocuTune remediation - Sensitive terms with GUIDs
pullRequest.body: Applying sensitive terms with GUID changes as part of Content SFI and outlined in [Overview - Writing content securely - Platform Manual | Microsoft Learn](https://review.learn.microsoft.com/en-us/help/platform/security-reference?branch=main). Changes are part of the Microsoft-wide SFI effort.
